alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 4:58PM CDT until July 22 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dickinson County in central Kansas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 457 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Moonlight, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotter reported quarter sized hail on K15 about 10 miles north of Abilene at 4:55 PM. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abilene, Chapman, Enterprise and Moonlight. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 275 and 289. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
